name: One Teddy Lost
description:
This demo build was created for the Stout Game Expo. Stay tuned for updates as we move towards a full release.

If you want to impact the development of our game, we'd love to hear your feedback through this brief survey: https://forms.gle/SgfrobN7z2dSC2Hy5.

Controls:

WASD - To Move
Mouse - To Move Camera
E - Interact with objects
Hold Right Click - Aim Pickup Object
Left Click - Throw Pickup Object
R - Activate Monster/Companion Ability
